ericlenovo.name: EricLenovo
ericlenovo.description: He is the developer of Gachatris Legends. He keeps an eye on what his powers are gonna do.

main.name: Phylum Star
main.description: Known for his talent, EricLenovo goes on to outdo himself when it comes to the Neoplexian Land.

rubystudios.name: RubyStudios
rubystudios.description: She is an Enchantress who uses dark and red magic.

main.name: Red Enchantress
main.description: The real Red Enchantress has come. Do you wonder what she's gonna do with her visually-remarkable dark-red abilities?

misty_firefox.name: Misty Firefox
misty_firefox.description: She is a human fox who uses fire as her name suggests. Not only that, she also has ice abilities to use.

main.name: Pyrokinesis Enthusiast Fox
main.description: Misty Firefox has the fire base. She uses Pyrokinetic abilities to manipulate flame and plasma.

dominic_zi.name: Dominic Zi
dominic_zi.description: He is EricLenovo's student and Epicman's friend. He loves playing two puzzle modes and he belongs to the RIVALS team.

main.name: Blur Stealth Leader
main.description: Dominic Zi basically uses shockingly rapid marksman skills and wants to accomplish his Rivals missions.

elisha.name: Elisha Dimensions
elisha.description: She is one of EricLenovo's friends. She loves using and playing with fire; she belongs to the Pyro Dimension.

main.name: Fire Propagator
main.description: Elisha uses Pyrokinetic and "Pyrogenetic" skills to basically manipulate and propagate fire.

epicman.name: Epicman33456
epicman.description: He's an adventurous neko aiming to dominate the Blobs and Blocks. His friend who does the same is Dominic.

flotalendy.name: Flotalendy
flotalendy.description: She's the leader and a Gangster from the Star domain.

eclipse.name: Eclipse
eclipse.description: This fairy herself hopes that she's gonna be the greatest fairy of all fairies.

abcia2.name: Abcia2
abcia2.author: Abcia2
abcia2.description: This one himself is themed in lavender; he likes stars.

izzy.name: Izzy The Grape
izzy.description: This grape lover holds a large grape and she always brings it with her.

skylight.name: Skylight Cloud
skylight.description: Her small starlit moon ornament tells all. She has a friend Izzy, whom she calls "her pet fish"!

main.name: Star And Moon In The Skies

emikama.name: Emikama
emikama.description: This is Skylight Cloud's online mother who goes by they/them pronouns. We can't see their hands but their sleeves serve a purpose. What do they have up their sleeves?

rainuff.name: Rainuff Cloud
rainuff.description: She aims to maintain the vibrance and color of the whole world with rainbow powers. Without rainbows, the world will turn grayscale and look like it's in the '40s.

gabbryielle.name: Sun Gabbryielle
gabbryielle.description: She is the one who discovered the Linkblobs that dominated Phar Re.

main.name: Little Dark Sunshine
main.description: Look how adorable Gabbryielle is even when she has dark colors.

elabbygaile.name: E.L. and Abbygaile
elabbygaile.description: EricLenovo and his wife, Abbygaile, are Sun Gabbryielle's parents. They are the Phylum leaders.

main.name: Phylum V
main.description: Their secondary accent colors are their favorite colors. Their base colors? They remain the same.
